1 //
2 // Original author: Adam Leon Kleppe
3 //
4 // Used in the Master's thesis for planning and execution of trajectories in MoveIt! for ROS.

6 #ifndef __IRONHIDE__ROBOT_OPTION_FLAG_HPP__
7 #define __IRONHIDE__ROBOT_OPTION_FLAG_HPP__
8 namespace ih
9 {
11 
15 enum RobotOptionFlag {
16  ROBOT_OPTION_NONE = 1 << 0,
17  ROBOT_OPTION_VERBOSE_INFO = 1 << 1,
18  ROBOT_OPTION_DUMMY_ROBOT = 1 << 2
19 };
20 
22 inline RobotOptionFlag operator| ( RobotOptionFlag a, RobotOptionFlag b ) {
23  return static_cast<RobotOptionFlag>( static_cast<int>(a) | static_cast<int>(b) );
24 };
25 
26 inline RobotOptionFlag RobotOptionFlagFromInt(int flag_num){
27  return static_cast<RobotOptionFlag>( flag_num );
28 };
29 
30 inline std::string RobotOptionFlagToString(RobotOptionFlag flag){
31  std::string flagString = "";
32  if(flag & ROBOT_OPTION_VERBOSE_INFO)
33  {
34  return "NONE";
35  }
36  if(flag & ROBOT_OPTION_VERBOSE_INFO)
37  {
38  flagString += "VERBOSE_INFO ";
39  }
40  if(flag & ROBOT_OPTION_DUMMY_ROBOT)
41  {
42  flagString += "DUMMY_ROBOT ";
43  }
44  return flagString;
45 };
46 }
47 
48 #endif // __IRONHIDE__ROBOT_OPTION_FLAG_HPP__
